title: Italian Design Firms
content: Does anyone know of any good design (print/motion) firms in Italy?
author: •Prakash Nair

comments.content: Not directly but you might find [www.aiap.it](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017131304/http:/www.aiap.it/ "www.aiap.it") useful (check out the links). I think it's all in Italian though but if you need free translation give us a shout.
cooool. Are there any like coroflot where they post jobs?

yep, on job service...  
For 30 days it will costs you 10 euros and 18 eeuros for 60 days. You need to fill in a form, nothing too complicated. If you want to do it, let's do it. If you prefer send me an email, I'm looking around myself so it's no trouble.
